* What are the underlying types of cpp11 objects?

vector   | element
---      | ---
integers |	int
doubles	 | double
logicals | r_bool
strings	 | r_string
raws	   | uint8_t
list	   | SEXP

* How do I create a new empty list?
```
cpp11::writable::list x;
```

* How do I retrieve (named) elements from a named vector/list?

```
x["foo"]
```

* How can I tell whether a vector is named?
```
x.names() == R_NilValue;
```
